li.zeitgeist.api
Class ZeitgeistApi

java.lang.Object
  li.zeitgeist.api.ZeitgeistApi

public class ZeitgeistApi
extends java.lang.Object

Zeitgeist API methods. Uses a HTTP interface to communicate with a zeitgeist installation.

Field Summary
private  java.lang.String apiSecret
          User API Secret used for authentication.
private  java.lang.String baseURL
          Base URL of the zeitgeist installation.
private  org.apache.http.impl.client.AbstractHttpClient client
          Apache HTTP Client instance.
private  java.lang.String email
          User eMail for authentication.

update

public Item update(int id,
                   java.lang.String tags)
            throws ZeitgeistError
Update the tags of a item. This adds or removes taggings from an item that is specified by ID. Tags is a comma seperated list with tags, each tag can be prefixed by + or - to specify to add or delete a tag, note that + is optional due to be the default.

Parameters:
id -
tags -
Returns:
the updated item.
Throws:
ZeitgeistError

update

public Item update(int id,
                   java.lang.String[] addTags,
                   java.lang.String[] delTags)
            throws ZeitgeistError
Update the tags of a item. This adds or removes taggings from an item that is specified by ID.

Parameters:
id -
addTags - array of tags to add
delTags - array of tags to delete
Returns:
the updated item.
Throws:
ZeitgeistError

delete

public int delete(int id)
           throws ZeitgeistError
Delete a item specified by ID. Only the creator (owner) or an admin can delete items.

Parameters:
id -
Returns:
the ID of the deleted item.
Throws:
ZeitgeistError

upvote

public int upvote(int id)
           throws ZeitgeistError
Upvote (+1) an item specified by ID.

Parameters:
id -
Returns:
number of upvotes the item has.
Throws:
ZeitgeistError

upvote

public int upvote(int id,
                  boolean remove)
           throws ZeitgeistError
Upvote (+1) an item specified by ID. The remove parameter specify if the upvote should be undone/removed.

Parameters:
id -
remove - True if the upvote should be deleted.
Returns:
number of upvotes the item has.
Throws:
ZeitgeistError
